body: Prerequisite: Amphibious racial trait; Benefit: Members of this race are specially adapted to the lightless depths of the oceans, but not to air-filled environments. They can see in the dark up to 120 feet while underwater, but do not gain this benefit out of water.
name: Deepsight
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Senses Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Deepsight
